meta.content: Challenge Preparatory Charter School | Far Rockaway, NY
Challenge Preparatory Charter School | Far Rockaway, NY
Since 2010, Challenge Preparatory Charter School has offered the Far Rockaway, NY community a rigorous academic curriculum within a safe and supportive school environment.

img.alt: Challenge Preparatory Charter School | Far Rockaway, NY

div.p: Welcome to Challenge Preparatory Charter School K-5!
Remote Learning Packets and Family Resources and services available HERE.

div.p: See the first ChampCast featuring scholars explaining the Word of the Month - Courage. A special interview with Coaches Reilly and Hassel also includes an exciting announcement for families who want to stay fit at home.
Watch and share this great news!

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

img.alt: CPCS Scholars in our annual Winter Show
CPCS Scholars in our annual Winter Show

div.p: CPCS Scholars in our annual Winter Show

Our community is not unlike many others across the nation, but the Challenge Prep approach is. We are squarely taking aim at the causes and issues related to local poverty, the needs of English Language Learners and special needs students, including gifted and talented children.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Success at CPCS means that parents, guardians, family members and community members support our efforts beyond the classroom. We have a very active Parent Association that meets every month, and we have a place for you to serve. Consider joining today!
